title: Per-Side Offset is currently not working as of 6.2

replies.body: As a sort-of workaround, set the camera to Semi-locked and press F9. A red border should appear around your screen. Edge panning should be disabled now. Move the locked position to where you want it with the Middle Mouse Button.

This comment needs to be upvoted. I just tried it and it works like a charm. This way you can mimic a set camera position of your choice. I am going to use this until Riot fixes the setting. Thank you my friend, you are a fun saver.
THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
I'm pressing F9 but nothing happens. ): {{item:3070}}

These folks are pretty quick to respond to anything that's skin related. Maybe I should tell them that the camera bug is turning all of my champions with a skin into weird polygons and that it's making my game crash, causing (insert champion here) to lose there skin. I mean, seriously. This is beyond ridiculous. We have bonus IP for people right now but because of this issue I get to suffer because playing is less enjoyable. Even though what FFF1 can work as a temporary solution it doesn't change the fact that they're deliberately ignoring our threads. If they don't have a solution that's fine, but they could tell us that they're at least looking into this issue.

We're not deliberately ignoring threads here. If it's not someone's area of expertise, it's generally not something they'd comment on because they don't have context on the issue, or anything of value to add to the thread.

hey katey, I just wanted to ask you if you were also aware of the black screen problem for mac users too. The game launches but the screen just stays black and doesn't connect or something. Anyway, It's really frustrating because I can't play, and just knowing that you guys know about it would make me feel a lot better.

I shot an email over to the team who works on this over the weekend, so they should be aware of it. I don't know what the status of this is, though.

**EDIT**: We're working on a fix.

Hey Katey, thanks again for following up and keeping in touch with us. We really do appreciate it, even if it isn't a direct answer or a fix just yet. It definitely keeps spirits high and it's nice to have a friendly Riot member to chat with.
Heyo! No worries! I just updated my previous post - we're working on a fix for this.

That may be true, and I am quite glad that finally someone has told us that it is at least known and will be looked into/passed to the right people.

However, even if it is not someones area of expertise it is nice for someone to at least let us know that, while it isn't their area, that it is noted and will be passed on to those who know more about the issue and can help better when they get back to work from the weekend or something. That's all any of us wanted was at least SOME acknowledgement that Rito knew or cared. The main reason for this was the fact it was stated Wednesday/Thursday when it was yet to be the weekend and absolutely no one said anything to anyone despite the many threads after the patch.

So, with that being said it is I am glad that someone finally told us that it will be passed on because just not hearing anything is a little nerve wracking and annoying tbh. Yet still. I thank you for letting us know that someone is going to be looking into it.

So, enjoy your weekend and hopefully this will be resolved sooner than later.

Totally understandable. 

In some Rioter's defense, they may have no idea what the case is, and if they aren't at work, they likely don't have access to checking in the database if the bug is known or not.

I'll be following up with this issue this morning.

And it is definitely understandable should Rito peeps be off for the weekend and may not be able to check the official data at the offices or log in to league to check.

I do wish they at least said they'd check into it, but I am quite glad we were able to get your attention and that you are such an amazing person as to follow up and help us on this issue. It is very much appreciated.

Thank you (>^_^)><3
Luck you caught me - I usually try to stay off the boards on the weekend and not do work. Just so happened to check in. :P

You'll need to [contact](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=38154) Player Support so they can take a look at your account. Please title your ticket "Unrecoverable Account".

Hey! 

I'd responded to your other thread, but just wanted to pop in here and let you know that we've seen the posts and it's on our radar. I don't personally work on this kind of thing, but I wanted to hop in and let you know we've seen your posts and will look into this ASAP. 

As **FFF1**  posted below, they found a sort-of-workaround in the meantime -  set the camera to Semi-locked and press F9. A red border should appear around your screen. Edge panning should be disabled now. Move the locked position to where you want it with the Middle Mouse Button.

I also want to say thank you to everybody who helped spread the word and staying patient as well. We're all gonna get frustrated, that's unavoidable, but it's nice to see people responding to (or noticing) a red post and not flaming instantly. Slowly but surely we're going to make League (and the boards) a far less toxic place. We may express how upset we are but I'm sure none of us want to start a Riot. -nudges- {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

I'm just glad I was able to get a hold of Katey. I think she's a great member of the boards and I'm glad I saw an opportunity in a less busy thread. Again, none of my anger was not directed to you specifically, I really do hope you know that. We love you guys, please try and keep us posted as best as you can.

This is an absolute joke. We're getting red posts for other things like the Lunar Revel shop and skins but we can't get a single red post for one of the what, 9 different threads stating this exact problem? This is completely unacceptable, Riot. I have no ill feelings towards them by any means because the last time I had addressed an issue it was quickly responded to and put the issue to rest. The fact that this patch has been out for over a day now and not one response has been made about a bug that was, according to some posts in another thread, a problem that was already occurring on the PBE and addressed a week before the patch came out. I _really_ don't want to have any ill feelings towards their department that is supposed to be lurking in the boards. But for whomever that comments on here that is a Riot member know that this is really unacceptable.
Just because there is no red post does not mean that they don't see the bug and aren't working on it.
